# Interface: PriceRange

Represents a price range.

## Properties[​](PriceRange.html#properties "Direct link to Properties"){.hash-link aria-label="Direct link to Properties"} {#properties .anchor .anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7}

### minValue[​](PriceRange.html#minvalue "Direct link to minValue"){.hash-link aria-label="Direct link to minValue"} {#minvalue .anchor .anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7}

> **minValue**: `number`

Maximum value in the range.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

### maxValue[​](PriceRange.html#maxvalue "Direct link to maxValue"){.hash-link aria-label="Direct link to maxValue"} {#maxvalue .anchor .anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7}

> **maxValue**: `number`

Minimum value in the range.
